import { Footer} from '../../../../Components/Organisms/Mobile';

# Footer

`import { Footer, FooterLeft, FooterRight, FooterBody } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Organisms/Mobile/Footer";`


`Footer` is a base for Footer in mobile. <br/>
Consists of `FooterLeft` for container left side, `FooterRight` for container right side, `FooterBody` for container center side component in Footer.<br/>

## Stories
<br/>

### Footer With One Button

`FooterBody` as container of [ButtonGroup](?path=/docs/atom-button-group--default) with one [Button](/?path=/docs/atom-button--basic).

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-footer--one-button"/>
</Preview>

### Footer With Two Buttons

`FooterBody` as container of [ButtonGroup](?path=/docs/atom-button-group--default) with two [Buttons](/?path=/docs/atom-button--basic).

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-footer--two-button"/>
</Preview>

### Footer With Three Buttons

`FooterLeft` as container of [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic) with [Icon](?path=/docs/atom-icon--glyph), 
`FooterBody` as container of [ButtonGroup](?path=/docs/atom-button-group--default) with two [Buttons](/?path=/docs/atom-button--basic).

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-footer--three-button"/>
</Preview>
